actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 23 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 (relating to the Federal Unemployment Tax Act) to provide for the eligibility of school teachers for unemployment insurance program.

summary.text: School Teachers' Unemployment Insurance Act - Extends under the Internal Revenue Code eligibility to schoolteachers for unemployment insurance under the unemployment insurance program. Makes teachers eligible who are employed in schools offering preschool, elementary, or secondary education as determined under State law, and in any school, junior college, community college, college, university, or other institution offering postsecondary education, including any private proprietary institution, which is authorized within a State to provide a program of education beyond high school. Sets forth methods by which State law may provide for transition to the requirements of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 23 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 (relating to the Federal Unemployment Tax Act) to provide for the eligibility of school teachers for unemployment insurance program.
